name: UnitedStars Enviro
overview:
United Stars Enviro Technologies Private Limited is a private limited organization, established in the year 2006 as a manufacturer & supplier of Water Filtration Systems & Plants. We also offer Water Cleaning Services as well as Water Treatment Plant Installation services.

Manufacturing Unit: Our company has developed a sophisticated manufacturing department that takes better care of providing excellent quality products to the clients. We possess a state-of-the-art research & development unit to verify the excellence of our range. Furthermore, our company possesses each and every requisite amenity that facilitates high production without any flaw.

Consultancy Services: Our company specializes in offering Total Water Treatment Management as well as consultancy expertise that assists our valuable clients to assess the possibility of project; along with to cut down on the capital specification as constructing pools is a project of capital intensive.

Clients Satisfaction: Products we offer to our clients are manufactured under the expert guidance of our knowledgeable professionals using cutting-edge techniques. We ensure clients to deliver products on-time as well as at reasonable prices. Furthermore, our shipment and payment modes are designed as per the convenience of our valuable clientele. Our products can be customized according to the specified demands of clients, which help us in building amiable relationship with them.

Our Team: Customer care personnel Skilled experts Masons Electricians Architects Engineers Designers
